Class MarkerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MarkerUtils

  • public class MarkerUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    MarkerUtils

    A Utility class made for creating markers for UnFoldingMap API

    • Earthquake Markers
    • City Markers

    Since:
    22/7/2019
    See Also:
    EarthQuakeUtils, MarkerUtils, WorldDataUtils, EarthQuakeEntry, DataEntry, AbstractEarthQuakeMarker, AbstractLocationMarker, CityMarker, LandEarthQuakeMarker, OceanEarthQuakeMarker

    • Method Detail

      • makeEarthQuakesMarkers

        public static java.util.List<de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.Marker> makeEarthQuakesMarkers(java.util.List<de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.data.PointFeature> locations)
        Makes the List to be added to the map and List will contain customized markers. that implements the CustomizedMarker interface ,so it will hold different types of Customized Markers in same list to return a single data structure to be added to map directly, uses the earthQuakeMarkersFunction loops on each PointFeature checking to see of which earthquake type it is from the AbstractEarthQuakeMarker hierarchy constructing the representing type using the earthQuakesMarkersFunction and adding it to the list of markers
        Parameters:
        locations - List of PointFeature containing the locations of the earthquakes
        Returns:
        A List of Markers due to given Point Features

      • makeLocationMarkers

        public static java.util.List<de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.Marker> makeLocationMarkers(java.util.List<? extends de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.data.Feature> locations)
        Makes the List to be added to the map and List will contain customized markers. that implements the CustomizedMarker interface ,so it will hold different types of Customized Markers in same list to return a single data structure to be added to map directly, uses the locationMarkersFunction loops on each PointFeature checking to see of which location type it is from the AbstractLocationMarker hierarchy constructing the representing type using the locationMarkersFunction and adding it to the list of markers
        Parameters:
        locations - list of Feature containing the locations of the locations
        Returns:
        List containing Markers of corresponding to Locations PointFeature

      • printAndSortMarkers

        public static <T extends de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.Marker & java.lang.Comparable<? super T>> void printAndSortMarkers(java.util.List<? extends T> markers,
                                                                                                                          int limit)
        Sorts the Markers due to their natural ordering and prints them to the limit given. uses bounded wild card to increase API Flexability to accept any list of Applicable type Marker that implements Comparable interface.
        Parameters:
        markers - List of Markers to be sorted and printed
        limit - int for given limit of earthquakes markers to be printed

      • makeRoutesMarkers

        public static java.util.List<de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.Marker> makeRoutesMarkers(java.util.List<de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.data.ShapeFeature> routeFeatures,
                                                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.geo.Location> airportsMap)
        Makes routes Markers depending on the routeFeature list and airport Maps made from AirportUtils.
        Parameters:
        routeFeatures - List containing shape features of routes
        airportsMap - Map containing Airport ID as key and Location as value
        Returns:
        List of route Markers made by simple Line Markers.
